The owner of a Chinese company claims to sell fake infrared thermometers to the United States

The owner of a Chinese company that sells infrared thermometers claims to make some fake infrared thermometers to sell to the United States.
Letting these infrared thermometers incorrectly measure 39 degrees to 36.5 degrees makes more and more people infected in the United States.

The name of this company is "Dongguan Haofeng Electronic Technology Co., Ltd."（东莞市颢峰电子科技有限公司）, which is located in Dongguan, Guangdong. The person who said this in the picture below is the boss of this company, Zhang Xuandong（张悬东）.
